topics.body:
I've been thinking a bit about life and I realized something(not that serious):
I like being a trap more than I want to fully transition.  What I mean by this is the more I think about it I don't want to get the final surgery.  In other words I'm thinking about rather than fully transitioning over the next couple years just being a quote "shemale" instead.
